attributes.action: A General Election Must be Called - Keep Democracy Alive!
attributes.additional_details:
Whether you're Conservative, loyal to Labour, or completely separate from party politics, it is important to uphold democracy and ensure the UK is steered by the whole electorate, not that of a single party.

Sign this petition to keep democracy alive.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson has just been elected Prime Minister by a tiny Conservative Party membership by promising tax cuts for the richest, leaving the other 98% of us without a say on who should run our country. The essence of democracy is that barring national crisis, the people at large should be consulted
